# NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime

**Enumeration**

A time at which to provide haptic feedback to the user.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PerformanceTime
```

## Constants

- **NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime.default**: Allows the system to choose the most appropriate time for feedback to be provided. Currently, this is the next time the screen is updated.
- **NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime.now**: Instructs the system to provide immediate haptic feedback to the user, rather than waiting for synchronization to occur with something visual occurring on screen.
- **NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime.drawCompleted**: Instructs the system to provide haptic feedback to the user the next time the screen is updated.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Enumerations

- **NSHapticFeedbackManager.FeedbackPattern**: A pattern of haptic feedback to be provided to the user.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
